body.description: Amazon Basics Salicylic Acid Acne Wash, is designed to clear acne blackhead and blemishes with 2% Salicylic Acid. Formulated without oil, this powerful acne wash will not over dry your skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Formulated Without Oil Use daily to control acne blackheads and blemishes Salicylic Acne Treatment Safe for everyday use without over drying skin Key Ingredients Salicylic Acid 2% gently cleanses your skin How to Use Cleanse skin twice a day. Wet face. Apply to hands, add water and work into a lather. Massage face gently. Rinse thoroughly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've stumbled upon this incredible face wash, and I can't help but sing its praises! The first thing that caught my attention is its refreshing scent – it's like a burst of energy for my morning routine. Using it feels like a mini spa session right at my bathroom sink.Now, let's talk about results. This face wash leaves my skin feeling so clean and revitalized. It's like waving goodbye to all the day's impurities in one wash. The formula strikes a perfect balance – tough on dirt but gentle on my skin. No dryness or tightness, just a smooth and refreshed feeling.The packaging is another win. The pump design is not only convenient but also ensures I get just the right amount without any mess. A little goes a long way, so this bottle lasts longer than you'd expect.Honestly, I've noticed a positive change in my skin since I started using this face wash. It's become a must-have in my daily routine. If you're on the lookout for a face wash that's effective, smells amazing, and adds a touch of luxury to your skincare regimen, this one's a game-changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cleanser for oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I like this cleanser - it is unscented. Before this I bought the similar one from another brand (Neutrogena) and they look and feel the same. It works good - the skin feels clean and it gets and cleans pores well. I would prefer this one for oily skin type, otherwise if your skin is not oily then you would have to use additionally another solution to moisturise after using this cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great face wash, definitely does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Love this face wash, only knocking a star off cause it doesn’t smell great. Don’t know if it’s an added scent or just the scent of the cleanser. I don’t typically like scented stuff and it’s not like it’s horrible or anything, just not great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great. I can see the difference immediately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works ok- super strong smell!
reviews.reviewText: While the wash is ok for my skin, the smell is overpowering. I thought it was supposed to be unscented, but it has a weird perfume/floral smell that I don’t care for. Not sure if I got a fake product or what, but i won’t be buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This face wash works well!
reviews.reviewText: I like this face wash, it works well to keep my face clear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would suggest using it just once a day, not twice, as it is very drying to your skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dupe for another brand, great buy!
reviews.reviewText: This product is a great dupe of another brand. This is a great value buy that works just as well as the original. The consistency is a little bit different than the Neutrogina version. The N version is a little more gelatinous when you pump it out, but this has a thinner texture which is actually better. The scent is a little different, but not bad. It cleans my acne prone skin without over drying it. I use it every morning and will definitely be switching to this. It was my first time purchasing, so I was pleasantly surprised by how good it is. The scent is different and not necessarily good, but it doesn't stay on your skin after rinsing your face.
